title: Meenakari Mohana Haaram: Floral Symphony in Pink & White
materials: Natural Rice Pearls (బియ్యం ముత్యాలు). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: A breathtaking floral design featuring meticulously handcrafted floral motifs, each adorned with shimmering diamonds. Delicate branches interspersed with rice pearls (motis) cascade into a magnificent lotus pendant. Modern interpretation of traditional Meenakari artistry is reflected in the subtle color palette and design elements.
occasions: and other special celebrations. Also suitable for upscale modern events and galas.
description: A unique blend of traditional artistry and modern design, this haaram is a statement piece that exudes elegance and sophistication. The meticulous craftsmanship and high-quality gemstones ensure lasting beauty and value. Its delicate floral design symbolizes beauty, purity, and new beginnings, making it a perfect heirloom piece. It's a showstopper, sure to attract compliments and elevate your style.
